description:
Haruka and Yuu have been best friends forever and they've always sat next to each other in class since… well, since they were just girls in junior high anyway. But on their first day of high school, they're stunned to learn that the new seating plan has them on opposite sides of the classroom! So, since everyone knows that long distance relationships won't work unless the parties involved put extra effort into it, they decide they need to do something extra special to permanently seal their friendship. However, deciding to kiss each other awakens a whole new level of feelings, and it doesn't help that some of their classmates seem to be 'involved" in similar circumstances. So what's a girl to do when her best girl friend suddenly seems more like a girlfriend? It's a life lesson that the school curriculum isn't normally prepared to teach, except maybe in French class, and our two young heroines are about to get a private education you'll never forget!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

node.description: [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/石倉賢一)

__Doujin circle:__ Gutstoma (ぐつとま)

Tachi is a Japanese manga artist, best known for her manga [Sakura Trick](https://anilist.co/manga/82257/Sakura-Trick).

She was approached by the editor of the magazine Manga Time KIRARA Miracle! on social media, where Sakura Trick ended up being serialized.

[Official Website](http://tachi.anime-life.com/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=1148816) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tt_tachi) | [Tumblr](https://tachitaboo.tumblr.com/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/381332122)

She joined [Magic Bus](https://anilist.co/studio/207/) after having graduated from from Yoyogi Animation Academy. She holds a pencil and colored pencil in the same hand simultaneously which allows her to draw shading immediately after drawing the linework.

Her real name is Kumiko Sakai, and she is occasionally mistaken for a man due to her pseudonym, which she has been credited with since 2000. She is also friends with [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/), and they often participate in the same productions. They're both big idol fans and their friendship sparked due to a conversation about Morning Musume, a girl group.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rsknkns)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rsknkns/)__

Ryousuke Nakanishi is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and musician, while also known as the representative director of Altus Inc. and managing director Up Dream Inc. He is also a member of the Japanese Society for Rights of Authors, Composers and Publishers.
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/石倉賢一)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).
Freelance sound effects creator.

__Height:__ 158cm

[Profile (m&i)](http://mand-i.jp/talent/fuchigami-mai/) | [Website (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/fuchigamimai/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fuchigami_mai)

**Height:** 156 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Asakura_Staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeO-6koTkcLNKLFcCiW1SGQ)

Part of the group [TrySail](https://anilist.co/staff/144938/), with fellow voice actresses  [Shiina Natsukawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118818) and [Sora Amamiya](https://anilist.co/staff/116517/).

__Birth Name:__ Sakiko Fujita (藤田咲子)

[Blog](https://blog.goo.ne.jp/sakky-ohana) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakitaf_1019)

She is best known in Japan for sampling her voice for the Vocaloid, Hatsune Miku.

__Agency:__ Apte Pro

[Profile (Apte Pro)](https://aptepro.jp/talents/y_aisaka.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuuka_aisaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuuka_aisaka/)

[Twitter (inactive)](https://twitter.com/endo_yurika)

One of the 6th Anison Grand Prix finalists with Natsumi Okamoto, as well as one of the winners of 2nd Annual Koetama Audition. She was also the bassist in the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia), and part of the duo [YURI*KARI](https://anilist.co/staff/324828/YURIKARI).

Yurika retired from the entertainment industry on June 1, 2018.

__Height:__ 157 cm
__Agency:__ Office Osawa

[Website](http://whv-amusic.com/iguchiyuka/index.html) | [Profile](http://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/iguchiyuka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yukachiofficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ooo31_iguchiyuka_31ooo/) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/15320.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuka_Iguchi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BA%95%E5%8F%A3%E8%A3%95%E9%A6%99) | [Youtube](https://youtube.com/@officialyoutubechannel3974?si=9AjlJ6Ujj2Vw1CiU)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Liter - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Otaru Rio - Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Cosplay, Hajimemashita (VN)
- 37 - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
- Koleda Belobog - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Profile](https://mausu.net/talent/igarashi-hiromi.html) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/yukinko-magic) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HiRoMi_ig) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hiromi_Igarashi) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BA%94%E5%8D%81%E5%B5%90%E8%A3%95%E7%BE%8E)

She is affiliated with Mausu Promotion. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Reimu Hakurei](https://anilist.co/character/5443) - Muse Dash (VG)
- Sonya - Memento Mori (VG)
- Sunohara Kokona - Blue Archive (VG)
- Volume - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/121927916)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/blackalpha_1)
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/石倉賢一)

__Height:__ 165 cm

[Website](https://www.tomatsuharuka.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/tomatsuharuka-blog)

Tomatsu debuted in 2007, starring in Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica as Corticarte Apa Lagranges. Since then, she has had other major roles such as Lala Satalin Deviluke in To Love-Ru and Shiho Sannomiya in Zettai Karen Children. Before graduating from high school in 2008, she used to live in Ichimomiya city where she often took the shinkansen, traveling back and forth between Nagoya and Tokyo to attend recordings. On January 11, 2019, she married a man from outside the entertainment industry.

One of the members of the voice actress unit [Sphere](https://anilist.co/staff/103636).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Mary - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

**Height:** 158 cm (5'2")

[Profile](http://kenyu-office.com/todamegumi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/todamegumi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/todamegumi/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/megumi.osaki.921) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/mysweet365days/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%88%B8%E7%94%B0%E3%82%81%E3%81%90%E3%81%BF)

She is a Japanese voice actress affiliated with Kenyu Office. She was regular on the Animate Pia Channel which was broadcast on Nico Nico.
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/石倉賢一)

Funta is a duo consisting of vocalist/songwriter UCO (U子) and guitarist/keyboardist Yoshimi (吉見). The Funta "sound" can be characterized as having a strong pop rock sensibility with a tendency toward electronic elements and moe-pop vocals.
